alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 4:20PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Sedgwick County through 445 PM CDT... At 419 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clearwater, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Andover, Haysville, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Clearwater, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Eastborough, West Wichita, East Wichita, Eisenhower National Airport, Northeast Wichita, Mcconnell Air Force Base, South Wichita, Oaklawn and Jabara Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 16. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 37 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
